definition: an instance of intense argument (as in bargaining), to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
details:
noun
- an instance of intense argument (as in bargaining)
= synonyms: haggle
- an angry dispute
= synonyms: row
verb
- to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
= example: to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
= synonyms: brawl
- herd and care for
= example: herd and care for
